titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the Asia Foundation records
titlestmt.author: Finding aid created by the Asia Foundation and Hoover Institution Archives Staff.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid derived from MARC record by David Sun. Date of source: 2008
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid is written in English

change.item: 2014 July 25: Added pdf inventory lists for each series May 17, 2011: Updated extent statement and date range to include new increment

physdesc.extent: 20 manuscript boxes, 1 oversize box, 483 cubic foot boxes

did.abstract: Correspondence, memoranda, project reports, conference proceedings, and financial records, relating to scholarships, exchange programs, and projects for social and economic development, and for aid to education, communications, health, and administration of justice in countries of South, Southeast and East Asia.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Asia Foundation records, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives between 1989 and 2011.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Private American philanthropic organization for promotion of political, social and economic development in countries of Asia and the Pacific region.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, memoranda, project reports, conference proceedings, and financial records, relating to scholarships, exchange programs, and projects for social and economic development, and for aid to education, communications, health, and administration of justice in countries of South, Southeast and East Asia. File lists are searchable via corrected OCR.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.
controlaccess.subject: Educational assistance, American--Asia.
Technical assistance, American--Asia.
Economic assistance, American--Asia.
Education--Asia.
Communication--Asia.
Public health--Asia.
Justice, Administration of--Asia.

otherfindaid.head: PDF Inventories of the Asia Foundation records, 1951-1996
otherfindaid.p: The PDF files are searchable via corrected OCR and include information regarding the content of the collection.

The collection is comprised of correspondence, memoranda, project reports, conference proceedings, and financial records relating to scholarships, exchange programs, and projects for social and economic development, and for aid to education, communications, health, and administration of justice in countries of South, Southeast and East Asia.
